      • addExchangeToken

        protected String addExchangeToken(String url,
                                  com.github.scribejava.core.model.OAuth2AccessToken accessToken)
        Adds the token to the URL in question. If we require appsecret_proof, then this method will also add the appsecret_proof parameter to the URL, as Facebook expects.
        Parameters:
        url - the URL to modify
        accessToken - the token we're passing back and forth
        Returns:
        url with additional parameter(s)
